title: bronze icon
body:
a reward or a badge of shame?

your thoughts

replies.body: Bronze shouldn't even receive an icon imo I mean theres literally no sense of achievement when you can troll and end up in b5 to receive a "reward" at the end of season
pretty much, to much "you came 25th in a race so you get a 25th place ribbon, good job!" mentality in the world today

Haha. You reminded me of my swimming carnival 10th place ribbons! lul 

To the OP: 

It depends. 

Some people try really hard and are just not as skilled as others, so they play in bronze. For them it may be a reward badge for actually trying and playing ranked. 

Someone is always going to be better than you - unless you're a top pro or play top of the ladder challenger. So why not just have fun, play to your skill level, improve, ignore the trolls and fly that baby with pride?
I wear it to warn others how garbage i am kekeke
